originalText.text: I recently had a hip replacement done by Dr. Reif, and after only 3 weeks, the difference it has made in my life is remarkable. I was in pain for so long, and had developed a gait that would compensate for that pain. But, after 3 short weeks, I can already notice a substantial improvement in pain, and in how I'm walking in general. I am on the road to getting my life back, and I can't thank Dr. Reif enough for allowing me to start this journey.

originalText.text:
Dr. Reif performed a femur shortening surgery on my left leg a year ago. He took me step by step through the process and the results have been excellent. He and the support staff, especially Jeff have been nothing but supportive and accommodating. HSS is a first class facility and I wouldn’t go anywhere else.
I highly and gladly recommend Dr. Reif.

text.text:

He and the support staff, especially Jeff have been nothing but supportive and accommodating. HSS is a first class facility and I wouldn’t go anywhere else.

originalText.text: Dr. Reif is an compassionate, thorough, and meticulous physician and surgeon. His experience treating complicated deformities from limb length discrepancies to malignant tumors has equipped him with real technical skill, patience, and empathy. Thank you for all you do!

text.text: Dr. Reif is an compassionate, thorough, and meticulous physician and surgeon. His experience treating complicated deformities from limb length discrepancies to malignant tumors has equipped him with real technical skill, patience, and empathy. Thank you for all you do!

originalText.text: I recently underwent surgery at HSS with Dr Taylor Reif and had a very good experience.  He is an excellent doctor who takes the time to explain every detail to his patient. His staff are helpful and supportive too and always responded promptly.  I have been suffering for 10 years and I am so thankful to him for making this whole process so easy.  I would recommend him highly.
